description: an ontology ID in CURIE format
a label of an ontology term
one or more labels of ontology terms separated by a pipe character

condition: in('example to be eventually removed', 'metadata complete', 'metadata incomplete', 'organizational term', 'pending final vetting', 'ready for release', 'requires discussion', 'to be replaced with external ontology term', 'uncurated')
description: the IAO curation status for a term
the 'Obsolete Class' parent for all deprecated terms

condition: in('failed exploratory term', 'placeholder removed', 'term imported', 'term split', 'terms merged')
description: the IAO obsolescence reason for term deprecation
a line of text that does not begin or end with whitespace
a single word: letters, numbers, underscore
a sequence source: IPD, GenBank, or UniProt
text that does not begin or end with whitespace
one or more Manchester syntax expressions separated by a pipe character
an OWL entity type: owl:AnnotationProperty, owl:Class, or owl:ObjectProperty
an OWL class type: equivalent or subclass
